Subject: Welcome Mat, Here I am
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/The Protectobots/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/
Sixshot/Ares/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Minion/Chaos/
Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/Unitron/Chordate/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:




Dark One transformed to his biped mode, dropping down near the Iron Fist, 
making his way to the original Alliance base, the other four Oblitercons 
following him with a rather happy feeling about them all at their obvious 
victory.

---

Demon Wulf, Flesh Ripper, and Dark Claw headed for the Iron Fist to seek 
quarters, not having any at the original Alliance base.  They weren't 
interested in the repair chambers, their wounds were nearly healed thanks to 
internal repairs with a boost from Vok technology.

---

Sixshot and Ares walked into the Alliance base, heading for the CR chambers.

---

Double Punch and Manterror headed for the Iron Fist, while Injector and 
Bumblebee headed for the Alliance base's CR chambers.

---

Minion and Chaos, rather battered, walked over to Demolition, their fellow 
War Machine member.  "Should we go see our leader?" Chaos asked.

---

Scattershot helped Nemesis keep up from his wounds, heading for the Iron Fist 
at a slow pace.

---

Unitron directed the bounty hunters towards the Alliance base, a sharp pain 
piercing into his head, but the cool metallic experssion that was normally on 
Unitron's face remained.  He ignored the pain, heading for the Alliance base 
himself.  Though internal repairs could take care of the light damage he had, 
he prefered to get it out of the way quickly.

======

Hot Spot looked to the two downed Protectobots and decided to skip the 
pleasantries and motioned for Streetwise, who was carrying First Aid's legs 
while he himself had his arms, to follow him.  They walked into the 
Cybertronian Fire, heading for the CR chambers.

Hot Spot had memorized the plans for the ship before setting out on the 
mission...in case drastic things had to be done.  Seeing Groove holding 
Blades and follow him, Hot Spot was slightly relieved.

---

Chordate looked around, transforming to his beaver mode and heading for the 
CF.  He was much to embarrassed at screwing things up royally to deal with 
any of his comrades.
